Object Parameters:
Which MDL0 from K_chairlift00.brres is loaded:
0 = K_chairlift00
1 = K_chairlift01
Description: Manager of the Shy Guy Ski Lift from DK Summit. Spawns 30 Chairlifts that travel on a route. Route setting 0 removes the Shy Guys. Route setting 1 randomly makes either 0, 1 or 2 randomly colored Shy Guys spawn on the chair.
